thread.title: Train damaged after hitting fallen tree near Inverurie
thread.title_full: Train damaged after hitting fallen tree near Inverurie

title: Train damaged after hitting fallen tree near Inverurie
text:
Train damaged after hitting fallen tree near Inverurie 22 February 2017 Close share panel Disruption has been caused after a train was damaged when it hit a fallen tree in Aberdeenshire. 
The incident happened close to Inverurie at about 11:00. 
Operator ScotRail said no-one was injured but there was damage to the front of the train. 
The Aberdeen to Inverness line was expected to be closed between Inverurie and Dyce until at least 14:30, and replacement buses were being arranged for passengers. Related Topics
